symptoms_questions: Do you feel unsteady or off-balance, particularly when standing or walking? Have you experienced falls or loss of coordination?
Do you have difficulty focusing or seeing clearly? Are objects appearing blurry or out of focus?
Do you have difficulty focusing or seeing clearly? Are you experiencing double vision or eye pain?
Do you feel pressure or tightness in your chest? Does the pain radiate to your neck, jaw, or arms?
Do you feel pressure or constriction in your chest? Does it worsen during exercise or exposure to allergens?
Do you have a dry or productive cough? Is it accompanied by sore throat or congestion?
Do you have a dry or productive cough? Is it accompanied by chest discomfort or congestion?
Do you have a persistent cough, particularly at night or early morning? Is it accompanied by wheezing or chest tightness?
Do you have limited movement in your joints? Are you unable to fully bend, straighten, or rotate certain joints?
Do you have trouble sleeping due to coughing, wheezing, or shortness of breath? Do you wake up feeling tired or unrested?
Do you have trouble articulating words or swallowing food and liquids? Do you choke or gag frequently?
Do you have trouble walking or standing upright due to pain or weakness? Do you experience difficulty with balance or coordination?
Do you feel hungry all the time, even after eating? Do you experience sudden hunger pangs or cravings?
Do you often feel tired or exhausted, even after resting? Do you experience weakness or lack of energy?
Do you feel extremely tired or exhausted? Is it difficult to carry out daily activities due to fatigue?
Do you feel tired or exhausted, even after getting enough rest? Is it difficult to concentrate or stay alert?
Do you feel tired or exhausted, especially during flare-ups or after physical activity? Is it difficult to carry out daily tasks due to fatigue?
Do you feel tired or run down? Is it difficult to concentrate or stay alert?
Do you feel unusually tired or weak, even after minimal physical activity? Is it difficult to carry out daily tasks due to fatigue?
Do you feel excessively tired or exhausted, even after getting enough rest? Does fatigue interfere with daily activities or work?
Do you have a high temperature, typically above 100.4°F (38°C)? Are you experiencing chills or sweating?
Do you experience recurrent respiratory infections, such as bronchitis or pneumonia? Do they require antibiotics for treatment?
Do you need to urinate more often than usual, especially at night? Do you experience an urgent need to urinate?
Do you have a severe headache, often accompanied by facial pressure or pain behind the eyes?
Do you experience frequent headaches or dizziness? Have you noticed swelling in your ankles or feet?
Are you unusually thirsty, even after drinking fluids? Do you feel dehydrated or have a dry mouth?
Do you feel your heart fluttering, pounding, or skipping beats? Do you have episodes of rapid heartbeat?
Do you experience pain, stiffness, or swelling in one or more joints? Does it worsen with movement or in the morning?
Do you have difficulty moving your joints, especially after periods of inactivity? Does stiffness improve with movement?
Do you notice swelling or inflammation around your joints? Does it feel warm or tender to the touch?
Do you have sharp, shooting pain down one or both legs? Is the pain aggravated by certain movements or positions?
Do you experience pain or discomfort in your lower back? Does it radiate to your buttocks, legs, or feet?
Do you experience body aches or muscle pain, particularly in your back, arms, or legs?
Do you experience involuntary muscle contractions or spasms? Do they occur more frequently during physical activity?
Do you feel sudden, uncontrolled movements or twitches in your muscles? Are they persistent or localized to specific areas?
Do you notice a decrease in muscle strength or difficulty lifting objects? Is there a loss of reflexes in your legs or feet?
Do you notice a gradual or progressive loss of muscle strength? Is it affecting your ability to grip objects or walk?
Do you notice weakness or heaviness in your arms or legs? Does it affect your ability to walk, lift objects, or perform tasks?
Do you feel tingling or numbness in your buttocks, legs, or feet? Is it accompanied by weakness in your legs or feet?
Do you experience numbness, tingling, or pins-and-needles sensations in your limbs? Does it occur on one side of the body or both?
Do you have a chronic cough, lasting for several weeks or months? Is it accompanied by thick, sticky mucus?
Do you have difficulty gaining weight or growing at a normal rate, despite adequate caloric intake?
Do you have a runny or congested nose? Are you experiencing difficulty breathing through your nose?
Do you notice a salty or metallic taste on your skin, particularly after sweating? Does it leave a residue on surfaces?
Do you have difficulty breathing, especially during physical activity? Do you wake up at night feeling short of breath?
Do you experience difficulty breathing, especially during physical activity or at night? Do you wheeze or feel tightness in your chest?
Do you have difficulty breathing, especially during physical activity or when lying down? Do you feel breathless or wheezy?
Do you sneeze frequently, particularly in response to irritants or allergens? Do you have a sudden urge to sneeze?
Do you have pain or irritation in your throat, especially when swallowing? Is it accompanied by redness or swelling?
Do you hear a whistling or squeaking sound when you breathe? Does it occur more often during asthma flare-ups?
